channel.title: Osmani International Airport (ZYL) on Osmani International Airport
channel.description: Recent content in Osmani International Airport (ZYL) on Osmani International Airport

item.title: Brief History Of Osmani International Airport
item.description: Osmani International Airport, located in Sylhet, Bangladesh, was built during the Second World War in 1944-1945.

item.title: VISA types
item.description: Citizens of most countries require a valid visa to enter Bangladesh.

item.title: About the Osmani International Airport (ZYL)
item.description: Osmani International Airport, also known as Sylhet Airport, is the third largest airport in Bangladesh after Dhaka and Chittagong.

item.title: Visa on arrival in Bangladesh
item.description: Citizens of certain countries and foreign nationals of Bangladeshi origin may get visa on arrival for a period of maximum 30 (thirty) days at the international airports and land ports of Bangladesh under certain conditions upon examining of their necessary travel documents and satisfaction of the immigration authority.

item.title: Terminal at Osmani International Airport
item.description: The airport has one building that contain both international and domestic terminals.

item.title: ATM and Currency Exchange facilities at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Osmani International Airport in Sylhet, Bangladesh, offers several options for currency exchange and ATM facilities to accommodate the needs of international travelers.

item.title: Baggage Service
item.description: Osmani International Airport in Sylhet, Bangladesh, offers a range of baggage services to accommodate the needs of travelers.

item.title: Domestic Lounge facilities at Osmani International Airport
item.description: MTB Air Lounge # Air Lounge Terminal: Main Terminal Type: Domestic Departure (Lounge) Location: Ground Level Business Hours: 06:30 - 22:30 Max stay: 6 hours Children: Children under 2 years old are admitted free.

item.title: Dutiable and Prohibited items at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Like most countries, Bangladesh has a list of dutiable and prohibited items that are restricted from being brought into the country.

item.title: Facilities at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Osmani International Airport offers a range of services for passengers to ensure a comfortable and convenient travel experience.

item.title: Guide for Domestic Arrival at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Don’t forget to take your hand luggage and all your belongings when getting off the plane.

item.title: Guide for Domestic Departure at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Confirm your flight # Passengers will receive a confirmation mail from the airline after the booking is complete.

item.title: Guide for International Arrival at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Don’t forget to take your hand luggage and all your belongings when getting off the plane.

item.title: Guide for International Departure at Osmani International Airport
item.description: Confirm your flight # Passengers will receive a confirmation mail from the airline after the booking is complete.

item.title: International Lounge facilities at Osmani International Airport
